name: disappointing
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 making you feel disappointed: What a disappointing result! The response to our advertisement has been somewhat disappointing. Synonym
unsatisfying
More examplesFewer examplesTiger Woods is determined to erase the memory of a disappointing Cup debut two years ago.The company blamed its disappointing performance on a misguided business plan.We were expecting to win, so a draw was a disappointing result for us.Her disappointing exam results are entirely due to her inattention in class.Responses to our advertisement have been disappointing.

not as good as you had hoped or expected; not satisfactory: The team has had two disappointing seasons. Kerrigan finished the race a disappointing fifth.
